name: Olympia, Takasago: Virtua Pachi-Slot III
overview: Olympia Takasago - Virtua Pachi-Slot III is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of 3 different gambling machines (Fruits machine, Nurse fantasy & Diana) with different levels of zoom. The game features a free mode (just to play the machines) and also a vs computer mode in which the player play in one of the 3 machines againts one of the 4 girls of the game.
